attributes.action: increase nurses mileage allowance in line with rises in fuel prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Community Nurses have no choice but to pay for petrol/diesel to visit patients in the community.  When fuel prices rise nurses have to effectively subsidise the cost of visiting patients out of their own pockets. this is unfair and the Government need to address the issue.  Morale in the NHS is very low and this is contributing to the lack of job satisfaction.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
